programme.title: In Hell
programme.desc: Kyle LeBlanc (Jean-Claude Van Damme) is an honorable citizen who winds up incarcerated in Russia after he takes revenge on the man who murdered his wife, resulting in the killer's death. Unfortunately for Kyle, he is assigned to a prison that is renowned for its violence. Controlled by a corrupt and sadistic warden, the facility regularly holds brutal fights between inmates. In order to survive in the prison, Kyle must participate in the battles, even as he attempts to retain his humanity.`

programme.title: Faces in the Crowd
programme.desc: Anna (Milla Jovovich) may be the only survivor of serial killer Tearjerk Jack's horrendous reign, but left with “face blindness,” she is completely unable to identify him – or anyone else. Now, with only a loyal detective's (Julian McMahon) face familiar to her, she cannot trust anyone as she struggles to resume her normal life, and, plagued by fear and a vindictive Jack, struggles to survive.

programme.title: George Poveromo's World of Saltwater Fishing: The Yellowfin “Window” - Brielle, New Jersey
programme.desc: With his MARC VI docked at the Brielle Yacht Club Marina, George and Ryan DeGraw - AKA - “The Jersey Kid”, contend with a bleak marine forecast, save for a seven hour “window” on one of the mornings. Taking full advantage of that window, they charge out into a dark New Jersey ocean and arrive at a spot prior to day break. Porpoise and whales greet them, and George's Simrads mark sand eels and some yellowfin tuna. However, the bite proves challenging, whether jigging, chugging top water plugs, live-chumming with peanut bunker and even chunking! Persistence does pay off, as George and Ryan pull it out - right before a southerly breeze gusting to 25 knots slams their "window" shut. The Brielle Yacht Club Marina hosted George's boat and team.

programme.title: Italian Comfort Food Classics

Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a live taste test of jarred pasta sauce. Finally, test cook Lawman Johnson and host Bridget reveal the secrets to a perfect Pasta Fagioli.

programme.title: Arroz con Pollo and Sour Orange Pie
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison prepare a comfort food classic: Arroz con Pollo. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of store-bought whipped topping. And finally, test cook Christie Morrison reveals the steps to make a Florida favorite, Sour Orange Pie.

programme.title: Pork and Pierogi
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare a show-stopping special occasion Cider-Braised Pork Roast. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a sauerkraut tasting. Finally, test cook Bryan Roof teaches host Julia Collin Davison the secrets to tackling authentic Pittsburgh-style Potato-Cheddar Pierogi at home.

programme.title: Regional Italian-American Favorites
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison a New York classic, Prosciutto Bread. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of provolone cheese. Finally, test cook Ashley Moore shows Bridget how to make the easiest-ever Drop Meatballs.

programme.title: Fish Tacos and Steak Fajitas
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof and host Bridget Lancaster prepare a Southern California classic, Smoked Fish Tacos. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top pick of chimney starters. Finally, test cook Christie Morrison makes Julia Grilled Steak Fajitas.

programme.title: BBQ Thighs and Fried Peach Pies
programme.desc: Julia Collin Davison unveils the secrets to the ultimate Barbecue Chicken Thighs to host, Bridget Lancaster. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of popcorn. And finally, test cook Bryan Roof demonstrates how to make Fried Peach Pies at home.

programme.title: Ballpark Classics
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison grill up Sausage and Peppers. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of whole-wheat sandwich bread. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews disposable plates. And finally, test cook Christie Morrison makes Julia the best Ballpark Pretzels.

programme.title: Reimagining Italian American Classics
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison a regional favorite-Detroit-Style Pizza. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews rasp-style graters. And finally, test cook Ashley Moore makes host Bridget Lancaster an updated version of a classic dish, Fettuccine with Butter and Cheese.

programme.title: Italian Chicken
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster go into the test kitchen together to uncover the secrets to Better Chicken Marsala. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews Manual Citrus Juicers in the Equipment Corner. Finally, test cook Erin McMurrer shows Bridget how to make the ultimate Skillet-Roasted Chicken in Lemon Sauce at home.

programme.title: Elegant Fall Dinner
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster shows host Julia Collin Davison how to make the best Tuscan-Style Roast Pork with Garlic and Rosemary. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews wine accessories in the Equipment Corner. Then, test cook Becky Hays reveals the secrets to making the perfect Farro Salad with Asparagus, Sugar Snap Peas, and Tomatoes.

programme.title: Pub-Style Favorites, Revisited
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster uncover the secrets to making the ultimate Pub-Style Steak and Ale Pie at home. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for knife blocks. Finally, test cook Keith Dresser makes Bridget perfect Boston Brown Bread.

programme.title: The Perfect Cake
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia make the perfect Gingerbread Layer Cake and Keith Makes Sticky Toffee Pudding Cakes.

programme.title: Chocolate Delights
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia uncover the secrets to making Foolproof All-Butter Pie Dough and Chocolate Cream Pie, and tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of cocoa powder. Finally, test cook Elle Simone makes Julia a decadent Dark Chocolate Fudge Sauce.

programme.title: Dressing Up Vegetables
programme.desc: We wanted to upgrade two favorite fancy vegetable dishes: twice-baked potatoes and stuffed bell peppers.

programme.title: Steak and Potatoes
programme.desc: Purchase a good steak and cook it properly, and all it needs is salt and pepper-and, of course, a side of spuds. Unfortunately, many of the inexpensive steaks labeled "great for grilling'' at the supermarket turn out tough and dry with little flavor. And mashed potatoes are often gluey or runny. We wanted potatoes with perfect texture and big flavor-something unusual to accompany a great steak and a good bottle of wine.

programme.title: Pot Roast
programme.desc: When it comes out right, pot roast is tender, succulent, and richly flavored. When it turns out wrong, the meat is dry, gray, tough, and full of fat and sinew. Good pot roast begins at the market, and we've found that cooking technique matters just as much as the cut.

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: The holidays are stressful enough. Dough that sticks to the rolling pin, cookies that melt together in the oven, and glazes that refuse to set up just won't do. We create a foolproof rolled butter cookie dough that tasted great and can be turned into an array of different cookies.

programme.title: Chefs A'Field: Kids On The Farm - Winter Bay Scallops: Chef Michel Nischan, Westport, CT.
programme.desc: Winter Bay Scallops: Chef Michel Nischan, Westport, CT. In this episode the chef plunges in for one of nature's perfect offerings,: the bay scallop, with its pink and orange shell and translucent, sweet meat. Breaking the ice, we pull up the sought after delicacy,: in-shell scallops that taste of green apples and the sea.

programme.title: Chefs A'Field: Kids On The Farm - Ice Cream From A Cow: Chef Bill Telepan, New York
programme.desc: Ice Cream From A Cow: Chef Bill Telepan, New York. The chef and daughter head out on a milking adventure in upstate New York to a dairy farm that is: "hopelessly out of date, and proud of it," says the dairyman. Here they milk and make milk products the same way they did it three generations ago, in small batches, delivered at peak freshness, pasteurized and hormone-free.

programme.title: Chefs A'Field: Kids On The Farm - Wild Foraging: Chef Jason Wilson, Seattle
programme.desc: Wild Foraging: Chef Jason Wilson, Seattle. In true Seattle style, the chef straps on his boots to trek deep into the woods around of the Puget Sound in search of wild mushrooms maple blossoms, stinging nettles, fiddlehead ferns, fragrant truffles, berries and a menagerie of exotic herbs, berries, and fungi mushrooms offerings from the wild.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino - Breakfast Favorites
programme.desc: Nick prepares French toast with butter braised strawberries in a cassis sugar, matzo brei, a breakfast burrito and kir royale.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino - Southern Comfort
programme.desc: Nick Stellino cooks chicken Milanese, Southern style biscuits and gravy and lobster macaroni and cheese.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino - Incredible Soups
programme.desc: Nick prepares Sicilian bread soup, onion soup with gorgonzola and prosciutto and chicken soup with meatballs.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino - Favorites with a Twist
programme.desc: Nick cooks crab cakes with tequila, corn and salsa, sausage meatballs with tomato sauce and halibut and Mediterranean salsa.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino - Coffee Rubbed Ribeye and Fried Green Tomatoes
programme.desc: Sometime in life, the most unexpected combination of flavors create a true culinary masterpieces and this episode Chef Stellino does just that. A magic rub containing espresso coffee turns a great steak into a work of art. Plus, a fabulous southern dish of : Fried Green Tomatoes receives the Stellino's treatment.

programme.title: MIX Cocktail Hour - Leftovers and Hangovers
programme.desc: MIX head barman Scott Cushman and host Tamee Harrison recover from Thanksgiving in their pajamas with craft cocktails designed to help overcome those day after hangovers: The Negroni Sbagliato, the very classic Gin Fizz, and Scott's aptly titled The Cure.

programme.title: Tequila Cocktails
programme.desc: Special guest and tequila aficionado D. Max Maxey and host Tamee Harrison take a tour of Max's expert takes on tequila based classics like the Margarita, the Tequila Sunrise, and El Rosa, a tequila martini named for Max's fictional grandmother Rosa.

programme.title: The Migrant Kitchen - Alta California
programme.desc: A collective of culturally connected, distinguished chefs (including Ray Garcia of Broken Spanish, Wes Avila of Guerilla Tacos, Carlos Salgado of Taco Maria, as well as Jorge Gaviria of Masienda) push forward the “Alta California” Mexican food movement.

programme.title: The Migrant Kitchen - Badmaash
programme.desc: Like carefully selected spices to a classic Indian dish, The Mahendro family contributes something special and significant to their restaurant Badmaash and to the city of L.A.

programme.title: The Migrant Kitchen - Omotenashi
programme.desc: Echo Park's Tsubaki, Sonoko Sakai, Wild Live Seafood's Seiichi Yokota and Spago Beverly Hills aims to introduce Angelenos to the unique spirit of Japanese hospitality and the culture's deep culinary customs.

programme.title: The Migrant Kitchen - Beyond Pho
programme.desc: Cassia in Santa Monica, Good Girl Dinette in Highland Park, Red Boat Fish Sauce, and Minh Phan of Porridge & Puffs are hoping to demonstrate that there's so much more to Vietnamese culture than banh mi, spring rolls and pho.

programme.title: The Migrant Kitchen - The Jewish Deli
programme.desc: The Jewish Delis of Los Angeles serve an important role for connecting heritage to food. Discover the delis that make up the fabric of Los Angeles life.

programme.title: The Migrant Kitchen - Sequoia Sake
programme.desc: Rooted in the traditions of Japanese sake brewing, Sequoia Sake works to resurrect an heirloom rice in California and pioneer the young but growing craft sake movement in the U.S.

programme.title: The Migrant Kitchen - El Jardin
programme.desc: Chef Claudette Zepeda-Wilkins opens her new restaurant, El Jardín, in San Diego. Inspired by the traditions of generations of Mexican women and combining regional heirloom ingredients from across Mexico, Zepeda-Wilkins takes a huge risk to elevate the cuisine in her hometown.

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: ​Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In a city with over 60 Michelin star restaurants, one brother will live and dine like a king, while the other will check out the city's more affordable street food scene.

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip
programme.desc: Heading up the coast on Highway 1, Curtis visits with a couple who turned from tech to cheesemaking and savors sea urchin with the only female uni diver in California.

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip
programme.desc: Curtis travels to the Lombardy region at the base of the Italian Alps where tours the prestigious Franciacorta vineyard and picks up a sparkling wine to pair with decadent sturgeon caviar.

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip
programme.desc: A visit to Western Australia finds Curtis in the quintessential Outback where he is educated by an Aboriginal elder on ancient fishing methods and herds cattle with a fifth-generation female rancher.

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip
programme.desc: A trip to Umbria finds Curtis chasing canine companions for black truffles and getting a tutorial from a master of porchetta.

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip
programme.desc: Curtis and friends from Maude travel to the misty mountains of Spain to milk goats, forage for mushrooms and uncork a sixty-year-old bottle of Grenache.

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Mexican Polynesian Wedding
programme.desc: Bride-to-be Erika wants a Mexican themed wedding, but her future in-laws are insisting she honor Samoan tradition. David must disarm a pushy mother-in-law and negotiate a cease-fire.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Mermaid Bride
programme.desc: With a groom who loves the 40's and a bride who loves mermaids, wedding planner David Tutera has to make this wedding sing, but it won't be easy. This quirky couple is hiding a very big secret.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Burlesque Bride
programme.desc: In the season premiere, David Tutera is pushed to his limit by an over the top, burlesque bride-to-be. Sophia knows what she wants for her big day including pasties, a latex dress and no compromises.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Traveling Teacher Bride
programme.desc: Teachers with a passion for travel agree on everything, except their wedding. Wedding planner David Tutera creates a high-flying event for bride Debbie, but the anxious groom Daniel is getting in the way.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Heaven And Earth Bride
programme.desc: David Tutera's bride Melanie thinks her groom, Dominic is heaven-sent. Her plans for a heaven-and-earth themed wedding are tacky. What's worse, the bride's mom insists that her daughter wear her old wedding dress - or else!

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Ancient Rome Bride
programme.desc: Bride Kandice thinks togas and tigers would be perfect at her "Ancient Rome" themed wedding groom Bryan disagrees. David Tutera struggles to keep her wedding classy and her "no filter" dad in line as the big day draws near.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Inspired By Kim K
programme.desc: Three controlling sisters push David Tutera to his limit as he plans a Kardashian inspired wedding for couple Vanessa and Adam.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Momzilla
programme.desc: The mother-of-the-bride goes head-to-head with couple Mia and Matt, as David plans their Casablanca-themed wedding.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Baroque, Pin-Ups, And Hot Rods
programme.desc: A shy bride feels left out when David bonds with her groom and not her. But after a risque photo shoot, she finds her voice and demands David's full attention.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding: Bollywood Bbq
programme.desc: Bride Amber wants to wear an Indian sari, but her stunt man fiance insists she wear white. Things get wild when the groom's loud-mouthed buddy intervenes.

programme.title: Love Blows: Double Crossed
programme.desc: Patti Stanger flips out when she finds out Lisa set her up, and the future of LuvBiz may be at risk. Frisky Nikki scares virgin client. Rusty and Annie get heated over their secret romance.

programme.title: Love Blows: Annie'S Secret Revealed
programme.desc: Shocking secret revealed at explosive family dinner. Annie loses it when she catches Rusty kissing girls. Nikki loses a celebrity client. Will a shy client's makeover help her find love?

programme.title: Love Blows: Annie'S Secret
programme.desc: Annie is enraged to find her mom called her ex-boyfriend. Nikki steals Annie's client - Chicago's Most Eligible Bachelor. Lisa calls Patti Stanger (Million Dollar Matchmaker) for help.

programme.title: Love Blows: Patti Goes Nuclear
programme.desc: Patti Stanger (Million Dollar Matchmaker) grills the LuvBiz team and explodes on the recruiters. Jim and Lisa face their toughest client. Nikki gets wasted. Jim fears Annie's idea may backfire.

programme.title: Love Blows: Indecent Proposals
programme.desc: Nikki's proposal shocks Lisa. Patti grills hot men for Annie's surprise mixer. John goes undercover on a date with LuvBiz's toughest client. Nikki blackmails Lisa.

programme.title: Money. Power. Respect.: The Mistress Is My Witness
programme.desc: The ladies jet to Jamaica for business and pleasure. Kendell ambushes her boyfriend with his mistress! Kelly uses Kendell's breakdown over the cheating scandal to get ahead.

programme.title: Money. Power. Respect.: Till Death Do Us Manage
programme.desc: Dana goes head-to-head with her husband over managing male artists. Wendy plans a new business venture that sends Ed Woods on a tirade. Drama erupts when Tiffany makes a play for Dana's client.

programme.title: Money. Power. Respect.: Judging Wendy
programme.desc: Kendell fights to kick Kelly off of a project. Dana hosts a brunch to impress her husband with new talent. Wendy calls on Judge Mathis for help with her PSA Ed is out! Tiffany and Dana's rivalry explodes.

programme.title: Platinum Babies: Betsy And Brad
programme.desc: Betsy decides to celebrate the birth of her and Brad's honeymoon baby with a fanciful garden party, and sets out to transform their home garden into a Victorian tea party.

programme.title: Platinum Babies: Jena And Peter
programme.desc: Jena and Peter Kravitz have spent thousands of dollars and several years working to get pregnant, so once their twins are conceived, they find it only fitting to celebrate twice as much!

programme.title: Platinum Babies: Dana And Tal
programme.desc: Hip downtown parents Dana & Tal have immaculate taste, whether it is in their Jonathan Adler décor or in their desire to dress their beautiful daughter in Madison Avenue's finest French baby couture.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The remaining contestants must serve their signature dish out of a food truck to a group of businesspeople.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Using only their eyesight, their noses and their taste buds, the four remaining chefs must re-create a dish without a recipe.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The chefs must create fusion dishes by mixing cuisines from two different countries. The winner has a dinner date with Chef Ramsay and their family while the losers participate in "moving day".

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The remaining contestants prepare five-course meals that are judged by five L.A. top chefs and food service executives. Who will be offered the head chef position at Los Angeles' L.A. Market?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen - 18 Chefs Compete
programme.desc: '18 Chefs Compete'' - An all new set of contestants tries to impress Chef Gordon Ramsay with their culinary skills in order to win the coveted position of head chef at New York City's BLT Steak restaurant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The remaining chefs try to rebound from their disastrous first dinner service. Their challenge this episode? Preparing New York steak strips, rib eyes, filets and burgers.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, the remaining contestants receive a wakeup call from clowns. They must prepare pasta and quesadillas for fifty kids and panini sandwiches for their moms.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay gives the contestants a chicken challenge that includes catching live fowl. The winners spend a day riding in go-karts while the losers prepare chickens for the next service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The remaining chefs get a demonstration in dessert preparation using sound waves and liquid nitrogen, then must steam, poach or boil protein-based dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The contestants prepare Hawaiian dishes for a high school's twentieth reunion. The winners spend the day on a yacht while the losers transform Hell's Kitchen to look Hawaiian.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Located in Indiana, J. Willy's Bar and Grille is deep in debt. When Chef Ramsay arrives, he challenges the owners to use fresh ingredients, but the inexperienced chefs get overwhelmed.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Located in Bellmore, New York, The Mixing Bowl faces an influx of competition and barely has customers. Chef Ramsay strives to correct problems with the restaurant's appearance and menu.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: When Chef Ramsay returns to Finn McCool's, The Olde Stone Mill, The Mixing Bowl, Dillon's, Campania's and Peter's, he finds restaurants saved from the brink of disaster.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay drops by Café 36, a French-American eatery in Illinois. The couple who own the place are lacking in business skills and need Ramsay's expertise to teach them how to draw in a crowd.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: When a quaint Baltimore café suffers a public image ordeal, Chef Ramsay stops in for some damage control.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: While in New Jersey, Chef Ramsay visits Flamango's, an outdated eatery in need of help. Ramsay suggests a major overhaul, but the owner thinks it's best to simply shut down the restaurant.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The owners of Chappy's, a Cajun-style restaurant, had to move in the wake of Hurricane Katrina. Now in Nashville, they're struggling to find a loyal base of customers.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay makes a trip to Pasadena, California to whip an eatery specializing in Caribbean cuisine into shape.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Mojito's, a Cuban eatery in Brooklyn. The owners purchased the restaurant as newlyweds, but they are now seven years into a crumbling marriage and business.

programme.title: Alexandra Hotel
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi meets John Humberstone, owner of The Alexandra Hotel in Llandudno.

programme.title: Paramount Hotel
programme.desc: The Paramount Hotel in Nottingham pushes Alex Polizzi to the edge.

programme.title: Gungate Hotel
programme.desc: The Hotel Inspector delivers hotelier Sue Tipton some home truths in Tamworth.

programme.title: Green Man
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi's trip to Wembley proves there's more than one way to run a failing business.

programme.title: Waterhall Country House
programme.desc: Can Alex Polizzi help to turn the Marsh family's fortunes around in Crawley?

programme.title: Fieldhead
programme.desc: In this episode, Alex Polizzi is in Cornwall trying to modernise The Fieldhead, a sixteen bedroom hotel in Looe run by Julian Peck and his wife Gill.

programme.title: Harmony
programme.desc: In this episode, Hotel Inspector Alex Polizzi helps launch a brand new hotel, but discovers a project plagued by the same old problems.

programme.title: Albion
programme.desc: In this episode, Hotel Inspector Alex Polizzi is called to a musically-themed B&B in Torquay that's failing to hit the right notes.

programme.title: Celebrity
programme.desc: Hotel Inspector Alex Polizzi is called to Bournemouth to help a celebrity-themed hotel that's missing some much needed glitz and glamour.

programme.title: Grant Arms Hotel
programme.desc: In this episode, Alex Polizzi is in Ramsbottom trying to help the owners of a 14 bedroom family hotel that's causing sleepless nights.

programme.title: Little thatch Inn
programme.desc: In this episode, Alex Polizzi is in Gloucester at the 14th century Little Thatch Inn, which has been in the hands of 71-year-old Jackie McDougall for more than 40 years.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: For the HP Challenge, the designers must create their own textile and design a look that is representative of their heritage. They are surprised when a member of their family comes for a surprise visit and helps them with their inspiration.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.sub-title: I Get a Kick Out of Fashion
programme.desc: The designers are treated to a show at Radio City Music Hall, where they learn that they will be designing an outfit for the world-famous Rockettes to wear in an upcoming performance.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: For Heidi's challenge, the designers arrive at Babies R Us where they learn that they will be designing an outfit for their youngest clients yet—babies! In a twist of fate, they are also made to take care of “real” babies: dolls that cry when they need to be changed, fed, or burped. And if that wasn't enough, Heidi throws another twist at the designers they also must create a complementary look for the baby's mom to wear.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.sub-title: In a Place Far, Far Away
programme.desc: As the designers face their final challenge before Mercedes Benz Fashion Week, they are tasked with their most difficult and creative challenge yet: making an avant-garde look inspired by L'Oreal's new line of makeup called “Electric Fantasie".

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Weak and weary from their journey, the few designers left say goodbye to NYC and return to their respective hometowns to begin working on their final collections. Tim Gunn travels to visit the designers and assess their progress. In the end, all four remaining designers must present their three best pieces to the judging panel, as the judges are left to decide who will move on to show at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: It's the moment of truth for the remaining designers as they each present their final collections to an eager audience at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week. One designer is named the winner of Project Runway Season 10, and the rest are unfortunately out.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Zanna Roberts Rassi introduces everyone to 16 new designers who will be competing against each other on Project Runway Season 11.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.sub-title: There is No I in Team
programme.desc: After just meeting each other for the first time, the designers are placed in two teams of eight and told that they will be designing in teams for the entire season. For the first challenge, the designers must create unique and individual looks inspired by NYC. They are judged on how well they do as a team…and the team is only as strong as it's weakest link.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: The two teams are tasked with designing new uniforms for the popular nightclub/ping pong club Spin. The winning design will be worn by Spin employees. Susan Sarandon appears as a guest judge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: The teams are presented with the challenge and privilege of designing a look for Heidi to wear in her ad campaign and for press events while promoting her new fragrance “Surprise". Two designers win the challenge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: The designers are tasked with the Unconventional Materials Challenge. Two of Project Runway's favorite challenges, the flower store and the hardware store, are combined for the ultimate “hard and soft” challenge. Also, the teams get a bit of a shake-up when two members leave one team and one member leaves another. The legendary Bette Midler serves as a guest judge.

programme.title: Couple of Yups/Bottled Feelings/A Screw Loose
programme.desc: First, Frankie and Lyndah find themselves in a fancy neighborhood, dealing with a pair of uptight yuppies with well-coordinated clothes and well-coordinated attacks. Then Lyndah goes wild when a truck-driving debtor gets physical with Sonia. And finally, Matt and Froy face down a backwoods Texan with secret ammunition.

programme.title: Mess with Texas
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home. Back in LA, Frankie's wild antics jeopardize a repo and push Lyndah to her breaking point.

programme.title: Frankie'd Up Beyond All Recognition
programme.desc: Matt and Froy set out to repo a truck from a wealthy Texan, but their mission backfires when the Sheriff arrives with a new arrest warrant that will send Froy away for good.

programme.title: Monumental Changes
programme.desc: Lou takes his new guys on their very first repo but, when the debtors attack with chainsaws, Ronnie and Carlos are left to fend for themselves.

programme.title: Adapt, Improvise, and Overcome
programme.desc: Lou plans an elaborate sting operation to infiltrate a cult, but everything goes awry when the new guys aren't prepared and Matt is left picking up the pieces.

programme.title: Deep Dish Disaster
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia repo from a stranded motorist who rallies the neighborhood around his cause and incites a full on revolt. Ronnie and Carlos set out on their first unsupervised repo, but their desire to impress is quickly derailed when an erratic debtor lets loose with pepper spray.

programme.title: Traffic Jammin'
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Repo Arigato, Mr. Roboto
programme.desc: Sonia and Carlos put their best performance in when they attempt to repossess a vehicle from a pair of silver-painted robot men.? Matt and Froy need a second opinion when they run into a debtor with a questionable claim about a life-threatening illness.?

programme.title: Inane Clown Posse
programme.desc: Froy and Matt have to wrangle with some angry clowns when they try to repossess a bouncy castle. Meanwhile, Lou and Sonia lose patience with a debtor over a recycling truck.

programme.title: Doggin' and Draggin'
programme.desc: When Carlos plays a repossession prank that almost lands Matt and Froy in jail, Lou tasks Froy with burying the hatchet.

programme.title: Raising the Roof
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy deal with an unbalanced debtor who threatens to take down the entire company, while Matt and Ronnie take on children's book vendors who are up to no good.

programme.title: Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take the opportunity to enact revenge on Ronnie and Carlos a repo at a car wash gets out of hand Lou's big mistake on a repo results in a debtor bringing the fight to their front door in a shoot out.

programme.title: Gypsy Hunter
programme.desc: Reeling from the shootout, Lou tracks down one of the culprits and enacts and elaborate plot of revenge with the help of Froy and Carlos.

programme.title: Gypsy Barbeque!
programme.desc: A jazz musician sets off Sonia and punches are thrown as Ronnie tries to manage the mayhem, and Matt and Sonia wrestle to bring deluded actors back to reality.

programme.title: Up in Flames
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy repo a car from an anger management meeting, Froy suffers the consequences of taking on a violent rage-aholic.

programme.title: Gypsy Games
programme.desc: When Rusty leads Sonia and Ronnie on a wild goose chase, Sonia loses her cool and puts her foot down with Lou.

programme.title: T-Bone Trouble
programme.desc: The team's work with anger management starts to pay off - with disastrous consequences. Matt and Sonia get into a standoff with a wealthy divorcee, his daughter and her raging boyfriend.

programme.title: Flame-Thrown for a Loop
programme.desc: Lou struggles to pick up the pieces after the accident leaves him needing Sonia more than ever. Lou and Carlos deal with a big man in a tiny car, but when Carlos lets his guard down he's delivered some serious blows.

programme.title: Probation Abomination
programme.desc: Sonia returns, but not before putting the team on probation and laying some ground rules.

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E234
programme.desc: Joining us on this week's I'm LIVE is risking city-pop songwriter nokdu! nokdu made his big debut in 2018 with the single "Say My Name." As a graduate of The Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts, founded by Paul McCartney and Mark Featherstone-Witty, he covers a wide range of genres in his music, ranging from Brit-pop to punk to R&B. Backed up by his academic background, he boasts his outstanding ability not only as a songwriter but also a lyricist, producer, and singer. Also known for his stage manners, he is quickly capturing the ears and souls of countless listeners. Currently, he's taking part in the competition program "Super Band 2." His fantastic performance in the show definitely makes us anticipate his future as a musician. In this episode, nokdu performs "Stay With Me," "Wona," and more to show off the essence of his artistry. Tune in to I'm LIVE and meet this talented artist!

programme.title: Home Disaster Zone
programme.desc: Everyone knows the biggest disasters happen under your own roof. Get ready, it's the Home Disaster Zone!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Alex Velluto - Thirsty
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Jeff Big Daddy Wayne - Big Daddy Kicks It
programme.desc: Comedian Jeff Wayne was dubbed “Big Daddy” by Billy Crystal and Robin Williams on an HBO Comic Relief show. The moniker has stuck to a guy who's been part of the stand-up comedy scene for a long time. He's toured all over the world, several times in Europe. The Norwegian Newspaper “Sondags B.A.”, described him as having “amazing audience communication, and ferociously funny!”

programme.title: Moody Molavi - Remove Before Flight
programme.desc: The christian comic is married to his high school sweetheart, who later became his stepsister through the marriage of their parents to each other. That's where the fun begins as Moody skillfully shares his life experiences.

programme.title: Jamie Lissow - Something Awesome
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Jamie Lissow is best known for his role in the current Netflix Original Series Real Rob, alongside SNL alum Rob Schneider, a show Jamie co-wrote and co-produced. Jamie made his network television debut on The Tonight Show and has since appeared on The Late Late Show, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central's Premium Blend, Gotham Live, Star Search, and his own half-hour Comedy Central special. A headliner at comedy clubs across the country, he's also been featured at The Montreal Comedy Festival and The Great American Comedy Festival. Lissow has appeared on Fox News Redeye more than 50 times while still managing to have no political opinions.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Eric Lyden: Any Chance You Didn't Shove That Job Yet?
programme.desc: According to Eric Lyden, all it takes to be a comedian is not being able to do anything else. Regardless, having alternative uses for cork screws, shove-it speeches, and white noise machines can't hurt.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Bill Boronkay - You Can Do Better
programme.desc: Sarcastic and self-deprecating, Bill Boronkay jokes about being too ugly to work for ESPN, dating out of his tax bracket, and how society is centered around parents.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Dave Goldstein: Isn't It Obvious?
Dry Bar Comedy: Matthew Jenkins: I Also Have Merch!
programme.desc: Unfortunately, racism is still alive, but Matthew Jenkins has a few ways around it: naming your kid Case Dismissed " going to the state penitentiary for a degree and reversing Simba's fatherless childhood.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Bill Campbell: Getting Up There
programme.desc: Bill Campbell is not as young as he used to be. Egos are lost in translation, contact lenses are replaced by magic markers, and garage sales are negotiated cent-by-cent.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Brian Hicks: Weird Mouth Things
programme.desc: The only thing Brian Hicks believes in anymore is shortening the lines at Kohls. Apart from that, Valentine's Day cards can remain unread, dentists can remain mediocre, and the meaning of subdivision names can remain a mystery.

programme.title: Lee Hardin - Not Quite a Grown-Up
programme.desc: Lee Hardin is a comedian known for making bad decisions and his love for Taco Bell.

programme.title: Joe Devito - First Of All
programme.desc: Joe DeVito's dead-on timing and unexpected twists make him a favorite at comedy clubs across the USA. His TV appearances include The Late Late Show, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central, Comics Unleashed, and AXStv's Gotham Comedy Live. He's also a regular on TV news panels, finding the funny in pop culture and current events. Joe's albums First Date with Joe DeVito and Three's Comedy are in regular rotation on SiriusXM radio.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Patrick Keane - long love the keane
programme.desc: Originally from the Midwest, raised in Orange County, college in Montana and a three-year stint in Asia make Patrick Keane a comedian with a background. Why college in Montana? Football scholarship. Why Asia? To get away from football.Since moving to Los Angeles in 2000, Patrick has appeared on Comedy Centrals Live At Gotham, the Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, the Bob and Tom show, Comics Unleashed, the Montreal Comedy Festival and is a regular at the Improv and Comedy Store in Hollywood. He was also a cast member on My TV Networks Tony Rock Project. (He was the white guy).When not headlining, Patrick is the opening act for comedians such as Nick Swardson, Joel McHale, Kevin Nealon, Kevin Pollok, Bobby Lee, Henry Phillips, Eddie Gossling and Bil Dwyer. While at home in Los Angeles he studies at the UCB theatre and Lesley Kahn institute. Asked what the key is to comedy, this writer/actor/comedian says, I try not to be funny and it usually works. With multiple appearances on the Late Late show with Craig Ferguson, his record setting viewer ship on Comedy Central, and his ability to tell the difference between people from Ireland and people from Northern Ireland, Patrick is the obvious choice to be the next host of the Oprah Winfrey show.His dry, self-deprecating style originates from influences Bill Murray and Gene Wilder. His favorite stand up comedians are Chris Rock, Lewis Black, Gary Shandling, Jerry Seinfeld and many other female comics not from New York.

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with W. Kamau Bell Part 2
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in this two-part showcase.

programme.desc: An all-new original live comedy event that is so funny, it's scary!

programme.desc: Ventriloquist and comic Jeff Dunham takes to the stage to provide fresh comedic material with his classic puppets.

programme.title: Travis Nelson: To Touch A Cloud
programme.desc: Ever since Travis Nelson was whacked by Mother Nature's growing stick, things have been looking down.

programme.title: Jeff Dunham: All Over The Map
programme.desc: A comedy set and travelogue by comedian Jeff Dunham as he and his ventriloquist's dummies perform globally from Iceland and London to Israel.

programme.title: Gary Owen: DoinWhatIDo
programme.desc: From Black Twitter, his daughter's homecoming date, to the rules of when we can and cannot use the N-word, no one does it better than Gary Owen!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Angel's Revenge
programme.desc: Take off your bra, perm your hair, and shine your love! Bridget and Mary Jo take you back in time to riff the 1979 classic Angels' Revenge.

programme.title: RiffTrax Shorts: Overcoming Fear
programme.desc: What better way for Mike, Kevin and Bill to Overcome their Fear of Overcoming Fear than by riffing the short Overcoming Fear!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Frankenstein Island
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this cheesy 80's horror classic! When four baloonists crash land on a remote island, one thing is for sure: they have a dog named Melvin! Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill as they take a trip to Frankenstein Island!

programme.title: RiffTrax Shorts: Borrowed Power
programme.desc: The stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 bring their comedic riffing treatment to this driving scare film. Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for Borrowed Power!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Ghosthouse
programme.desc: The stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 bring their comedic riffing treatment to this horror classic about a dead little girl who has an evil clown doll that commands her to kill. That's all well and good. But it's the little things about Ghosthouse that really make you stand up and say “Wait, what?”

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Tiny Astronaut
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to The Tiny Astronaut! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill and a bunch of mouse rocket enthusiasts for The Tiny Astronaut!

programme.title: RiffTrax Presents: Fear
programme.desc: Medical student Larry has lost his scholarship! Or has he? This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mary Jo and Bridget from RiffTrax.

programme.title: RiffTrax: Santa's Summer House
programme.desc: When a mysterious fog (fog FX not depicted) reroutes their resort shuttle, a group of tourists find themselves stranded at Santa's Summer House. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: A Change of Art The Litterbug
programme.desc: While painting outdoors, Elinor and her class experiment with natural items that they find after they run out of paint Elinor, Ari and Olive help Mrs. Hippo pick up litter.

programme.title: Donkey's Bad Day Yodel Bird Egg
programme.desc: Donkey and Panda's Awesome, Extra Fun, Very Good Day does not go well Donkey and Panda find a yodel bird egg and vow to protect it.

programme.title: Follow That Boat Windmill Monkey
programme.desc: Curious George is a sweet African monkey who can't help but run into trouble. George's friend, "The Man in the Yellow Hat," tries very hard to care for George and is always saving the day. The show's themes are about learning, forgiveness and playful curiosity.

programme.title: Socks for Sale Alma's Animal Show
programme.desc: Chacho chews up the socks that Alma plans to donate Alma and friends make an animal show.

programme.title: I Am Confucius I Am Sacagawea
programme.desc: Xavier and Yadina overcome a sibling spat with the help of Confucius Sacagawea helps Xavier and Brad realize that just because Yadina is younger, she can do more than they think.

programme.title: Mouse in the Treehouse Leader of the Pack
programme.desc: Molly and Tooey design their dream treehouse, complete with a windmill and elevator, but plans might have to change when Tooey's cat gets loose Tooey's puppy doesn't like following directions.

programme.title: Kite Delight Little Lost Horse
programme.desc: The crew learns about how wind moves things when they help a boy make a new kite the crew helps a little girl find her toy horse that she lost on the beach.

programme.title: Spring Bunnies
programme.desc: This show follows the adventures of animated versions of brothers Chris and Martin Kratt, hosts of such educational shows as "Kratts' Creatures" and "Zoboomafoo." In the show, the animated Kratts encounter wild animals during stories of adventure and mystery. The live-action Kratt brothers introduce each episode.

programme.title: The Sandwich Project Wax on Wax Odd
programme.desc: Young government agents Olive and Otto use math to investigate strange occurrences in their town. Produced by The Fred Rogers Co., this live-action series targets preschool and early elementary schoolchildren and their families. Odd Squad cases include disappearing zeroes, Santa's missing reindeer, runaway dinosaurs, and characters who escape from books. Throughout the series, Olive and Otto learn not only how to solve problems but also about working together, communication and perseverance.

He also has to contend with his sisters, but loves playing with his friends: tomboy Francine, foodie and best pal Buster, supersmart Brain, rich girl Muffy and geography expert Sue Ellen.

programme.title: The Case of the Missing Memory
programme.desc: After being warped into Cyberspace from a library computer, Matt leads friends Jackie and Inez as Cybersquad. With live hosts Bianca and Harry, the team must protect Motherboard from the evil Hacker who wants to rule Cyberspace. Using gadgets and following clues, the team solves math mysteries and any other problem that comes their way.
