programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapo. Realizing how to correctly wield the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates evil replicas of the Ninja to face off with our heroes. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are invited back the Darkly's Boarding School, only to discover it's a trap and now the bad kids have seized control of the school. With the Ninja trapped in the school with the faculty, things spiral out of control as the Evil Replica Ninja arrive. As an awesome battle takes place in the school halls, the Ninja manage to outsmart their evil versions, and warn Lord Garmadon they're ready for whatever else he throws at them.

programme.title: Monster Chef - Episode 205
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his “Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition” cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. “Hot chili makes hot monsters!” Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands – meaning Jestro's – could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. “Nope, not hot enough…waaaay too much garlic….you call that hot?!” (BELCH!)

programme.title: Change Of Address - Episode 15
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong – especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing (“Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?”), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out - Episode 206
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests then…more training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort “Exalted Towers” renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the “high class” resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are “off” at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to see…Jestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters – though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In - Episode 16
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends – until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends – until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to ‘turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster. Tired of intense training, Lloyd yearns to play and enjoy his youth. The Ninja remind Lloyd that along with great power, comes great responsibility. When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to ‘turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and soon discover they've been turned into kids! Seeking Lloyd's help and relying on childhood antics, the five ninja kids must destroy the reawakened monster that's hunting them in the city. In the end, Lloyd makes the difficult decision and sacrifices his youth in order to save them from the beast, turning forward the clock and turning Lloyd into a young man. Sensei Wu fears now that since Lloyd is young man, the final battle of good versus evil approaches sooner than he had ever expected.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever - Episode 207
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of “snotty” monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham – one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a “snotheiser” ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters … some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bath…he'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or two…it's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power “Glorious Griffon” but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: I Told You So - Episode 17
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her – till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit…

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight - Episode 208
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton – the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hear…laughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, “my monster is so fat” jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as “bouncers” to keep too many people out of the comedy club. (“Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.”) The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. And…Jestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be bad…he is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages him…go on stage alone, be funny…he can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a “joke book” that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny – by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: “Where's my Jestro?!” Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest with…the Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: Snow Way - Episode 18
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Stone Army
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers. Lord Garmadon struggles controlling the Serpentine now that he is without the Mega-Weapon. His latest endeavor is to lead the snakes in search of a fabled Dark Island that ancient texts say holds dark powers. Unable to find the island, the furious Serpentine abandon Lord Garmadon out at sea. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are called to the museum to find the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has seeped into the ground beneath the city, and it's brought an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior to life! Our heroes come across Misako, Lloyd's long lost mother. She's an archeologist in search of stopping the prophesized battle between Lloyd and his father. She had unearthed the Stone Warrior, and shares how it was once part of an indestructible army created by a dark spirit named The Overlord. When the balance is altered and evil is let into Ninjago, it will allow the Overlord to return and bring darkness and destruction to the land. Unable to destroy the Terminator-like Stone Warrior, the Ninja cleverly trap it. In the end, Lord Garmadon awakens on a small island at sea and hears the voice of the banished Overlord, promising him his wildest dreams. Garmadon uses his four hands to activate a mechanism, raising a lost land from out of the sea, creating a Yin/Yang symbol with Ninjago. The ultimate battle between good and evil begins to unfold.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious - Episode 209
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal to…Clay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some ‘Master Plan.” Suddenly, they realize Monsters – led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster – are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lance…finally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the books…and now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayal…the Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towards…the Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Midwinter Night's Dream - A Robot Musical - Episode 19
programme.desc: When Emma accidentally causes Olivia to lose an important science prize, a furious Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends. But after a New Year's Eve dream, in which a living, breathing Zobo takes her on a tour of her past, present and potential future, Olivia is reminded that friendship is the most valuable prize of all. Today is the most important day of Olivia's life. Not because tonight is New Year's Eve, but it's also the day of the annual Robotics Challenge, when teen scientists compete to build the best robot and win a full university scholarship. Olivia has spent the whole year preparing her entry: an all-new, high-tech, flying Aviator Zobo. It's a sure winner – until Emma accidentally sabotages it and wins the trophy herself! Furious, Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends (for defending Emma), and stomps out in tears. That night, in a dream, a living, breathing Aviator Zobo takes her on a tour of her life – past, present and potential future – to remind her that friendship is the most valuable prize of all.

programme.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still
programme.desc: The ninja try to flee from the rest of the Stone Army that has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom - and things get a lot worse when Garmadon arrives with a ‘Helmet of Darkness' and seizes control of the Stone Army. Scales finally takes leadership over the Serpentine and plans to burrow beneath Ninjago City to level it to the ground. But as they burrow, they run into a lost chamber holding the rest of the Stone Army. The Devourer's toxic venom in the ground brings the Stone Army to life, sealing the Serpentine in their tomb, and returning the snakes back to where they were first found. On the Dark Island, the Overlord directs Lord Garmadon to a giant celestial clock. Garmadon removes a ‘Helmet of Darkness', which will grant the wearer control over the Stone Army, and also activate the clock to tick down to when the final battle will begin. Back in Ninjago City, the indestructible Stone Army surfaces and attacks, and the Ninja know the only thing they can do is to save as many people as they can. They manage to barely escape with other townspeople, only for the Destiny's Bounty's engines to get damaged. In the end, Lord Garmadon arrives with the helmet, and seizes control of the Stone Army.

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heroes - Episode 210
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters, having the final pieces of his evil plan in place, tries to take human form. Can the NEXO-Knights and Merlok 2.0 stop the greatest threat they've ever faced? Or will the kingdom be plunged into darkness…forever. The Redoubt of Ruination readies the final ceremony to call forth MONSTRUX, the arch-necromancer of the past. Clay, holding the Book of Betrayal walks to the gates of the spooky place. Inside, Clay hears strange…singing and music. It's like a twisted Broadway show of some kind. Meanwhile, the Knights all realize Clay is gone and so is the Book of Betrayal. Macy says Clay must be up to something. They have to trust him and, more importantly, they have to find him. At the Redoubt of Ruination the ceremony has already begun! The Book of Monsters wants the final ceremony that calls forth Monstrux to be like a really great show! The BOM then barfs up all the BOOKS OF EVIL into their places around Jestro. He's just missing the BOOK OF BETRAYAL, which Clay has. Clay says he'll trade the book for Jestro. The BOM immediately agrees to the deal and sets Jestro free. Then, Monsters grab-up Clay, restrain him, and put him in Jestro's place on the sacrifice stone. From outside, they're interrupted by the sounds of battle the Knights have arrived on the Fortrex and are attacking the Redoubt of Ruination. In the confusion, Jestro slips away. The BOM lets loose with a powerful protection spell to keep the Knights out as he starts with the ceremony…he's going to bring Monstrux out and remanifest him in Clay's body! Jestro is able to escape the Redoubt and make his way to the Knights, who can't seem to battle their way in. It's a race against time as the Knights try to get in and save Clay. As the Knights get in, they see that the crazy BOM is absorbing all the Books of Evil, one-by-one. He grows BIGGER and BIGGER! Macy calls for NEXO-Power…but it's not enough! The gigantic Book of Monsters sucks down the final book, the Book of Betrayal! He looms over Clay, about to consume him, too, and make him into Monstrux! Suddenly, Robin appears carrying TECHKALIBER…he tosses it to Clay. Just as the huge Book of Monsters falls on Clay, he holds up Techkaliber and Merlok 2.0 is there…his full power in the sword. Clay sticks the sword into the Book of Monster's huge mouth. BOOM! There's a BIG, MAGICAL EXPLOSION! As we cut back inside, we see the Book of Monsters is gone. The Knights release Clay and he thanks them and Jestro for saving him. Jestro thanks them all for saving him and seeing the good in him. WE DISSOLVE TO: The JoustDome. In a final ceremony the King and Queen reward the knights and congratulate them for keeping the kingdom safe. There are speeches, happiness and friendship. And Jestro even does a bit that's funny. At the very end we see a hint of something…Monstrux and the Book of Monsters are still out there.

programme.title: The Last Voyage
programme.desc: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a ‘Temple of Light' that can restore the Ninjas' elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship. The Stone Army and Lord Garmadon have disappeared, and our heroes can see the mysterious Dark Island off their coastline. Fearing Garmadon is up to no good, Sensei Wu has the whole team suit up to begin a journey to the Dark Island. Since the Bounty's engines are damaged, they plan to go by sea. Misako reveals her ancient scrolls state of a ‘Temple of Light' that could return the Ninja's elemental powers, and it could be found on the island. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon has the Army mining for more ‘Dark Matter', using it to build a Super-Weapon that will recreate Ninjago in a twisted evil way. When a storm hits at sea, our heroes are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like starfish that can eat through a ship) and are forced to find refuge on a lighthouse at sea. Inside, Zane discovers his inventor father, the Tinkerer, is alive! Together, they repair the Bounty so it can fly again, escaping a giant Leviathan, and soaring to the Dark Island ahead.

programme.title: The Cloud - Episode 301
programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an “independent study” – he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles – which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together – and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: The Island Of Darkness
programme.desc: After battling off Garmadon's Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined. The Ninja camouflage the Bounty, creating a secret rebel base on the island. Misako says they must find the Temple of Light, because only when their elemental powers return, will they be strong enough to defeat the indestructible Stone Army. The Ninja search the dark, exotic island and come across Garmadon's compound, where they're building the Super-Weapon. The Ninja discover the Temple of Light is hidden at the highest peak of the island, and the Tinkerer aids their trek in creating a Drill Dozer so they can travel underground unnoticed. A final chase and battle takes place at the Temple of Light, as the Ninja solve the puzzle and harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd, who also becomes more powerful then he ever imagined. Their new abilities can destroy the indestructible Stone Warriors. Although Lord Garmadon finds this to be a setback, the Overlord reassures him darkness will prevail, as we end on seeing the Celestial Clock ticking down closer to zero.

programme.title: A Little Rusty - Episode 302
programme.desc: The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro unlocks a mysterious Forbidden Power. What kind ofhavoc will they unleash? And can Merlok 2.0 and the NEXO KNIGHTS make the new COMBO NEXO Powers work? The Knights finally make it to the Lava Lands – using their various new forms of transport, which are all strictly civilian vechicles – and they must regroup and learn to fight together again to face the new threat of Jestro, the Cloud of Monstrox, and their STONE MONSTERS (in this case, Stone Gargoyles.) But Jestro and his monsters beat back the knights and recover the STAFF OF MONSTROX – which was buried under the ceremonial chamber from Episode 210 (and is now the Lava Puker amusement park ride) – and they get away on Jestro's EVIL MOBILE, which he recovers from the HQ garage. Macy says this is exactly why she's been touring the kingdom preparing everyone for the next attack. The Knights have to get it together because now the entire kingdom is under threat…again. Robin decides he must upgrade the Knights' vehicles and make them more “fight optimized.” Ava and Merlok 2.0 must figure out how to use new NEXO Powers because regular NEXO Powers do make Stone monsters back into stone, but the Cloud simply zaps them to life again. Meanwhile, in the IRON MOUNTAINS, Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find the first of the Forbidden Powers: RELENTLESS RUST. They find the ROGUL STATUE holding the power and zap him to life. Now…they can rust those shiny knights to pieces! Ava and Merlok are attempting to use NEXO COMBO POWERS – with hilarious results – as they try to figure out how they might work. When Jestro attacks, he's able to halt the Fortrex by instantly rusting its tracks and wheels! Robin has his hands full trying to clean all the rust from the attack of Relentless Rust. As the Knights attempt to defend against Jestro, the Cloud is zapping statues to life. He hits a statue with a bolt of lightning as Clay is touching it. Something happens…Clay feels odd stiff as if rock is mixing with his body. Finally, Ava and Merlok 2.0 download to the Knights their new thing: a COMBO NEXO COMBO Power. It works! It can smash the animated statues to dust! They use it to defeat Jestro, but he and the Cloud get away with the Forbidden Power of Relentless Rust. Victory … sort of. Clay talks to Merlok 2.0…something has happened to him. What can they do? Merlok 2.0 is very concerned.

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's ‘Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their ‘captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

But it's a kitten who upsets and upstages Ebb and Bird. But the kitten is too adventurous, falls in the water and has to be rescued by Ebb. Hurrah For Ebb.

programme.desc: Urmel changes into a ghost by falling into a big white shirt Toots has hung up on the clothes line.

programme.title: Albert Says: Nature Knows Best - Air - It's Everywhere Isn't It?
programme.desc: Travel with Albert and a magpie to find out where air comes from, and the danger it's facing

programme.title: Albert Says: Nature Knows Best - Rainforests - Long May They Reign
programme.desc: Join Albert on his fact-finding mission as he searches for the root of the rain forest's problems.

programme.title: Bob's Beach - Oh Brother!
programme.desc: Whilst exercising in gym, Honcho the crab told Bob about his long lost brother.

programme.title: Bob's Beach - The Journey To The Centre Of Irie
programme.desc: During an escape attempt, Bob falls into a mysterious cave that leads to the centre of the island.

programme.title: Counting With Paula - 1, 2, 3, Jump!

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - Dugong
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers seek a safe home for a dugong.

programme.title: Gloria's House - I Wanna Go Home
programme.desc: Full of great ideas, Mr Patchouli's latest project is a house swap. Millicent is ecstatic.

programme.title: Gloria's House - The Fine Print
programme.desc: Gloria's school work is slipping and she may have to stay back and repeat a year.

programme.title: Counting With Paula - Pet Fish Friend
programme.desc: Counting with Paula is a fun and educational series about numbers for pre-school children.

programme.title: Earth: The Nature Of Our Planet
programme.desc: It's the solid crust of our planet, the perfect element in which to record the stories of deep time and of lifetimes. Change and progression is the way of earth. Air and water turn solid rock into soil. Animals walk upon that soil and are supported by it but plants turn soil into life. We learn how they can feed themselves and the whole chain of animal life, in the realm of Land.

programme.title: Tian Shan: Land Of Bears And Horses
programme.desc: Spring is in the Tian Shan, the ‘Mountains of Heaven' in the south of Kazakhstan, in Asia, and two brown bear cubs and their mother have just left their den. For the brothers a journey full of adventures begins, but their mother will teach them how to master life between high summits and vast grasslands. For the first time ever a film team has managed to capture the family life of brown bears in the mountains of Asia. This is a warm-hearted, authentic portrait of a bear family, their neighbours and the beauty of their rugged homeland.

programme.title: The Wildlife
programme.desc: Deepest darkest Africa... Not many know too much about it, and what we have seen on TV doesn't even begin to describe the natural beauty. Welcome to Volunteer Southern Africa, a social programme that's over 10 years old and thas hosted nearly 10,000 volunteers from 25 different countries changing lives while doing so. Here, volunteers get to life the real “bush life” and we track every step of this incredible journey.

programme.title: The Wildlife
programme.desc: Deepest darkest Africa... Not many know too much about it, and what we have seen on TV doesn't even begin to describe the natural beauty. Welcome to Volunteer Southern Africa, a social programme that's over 10 years old and thas hosted nearly 10,000 volunteers from 25 different countries changing lives while doing so. Here, volunteers get to life the real “bush life” and we track every step of this incredible journey.

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.desc: The otter brothers are back! This time, older brother Puba needs some serious dental work, and The Wildlife Docs call in a dentist that works on people! Can the team save Puba's tiny teeth? See what it takes to perform an otter root canal! Then, when you think of alligators their big mouth and scaly skin come to mind. But did you know they make some of the best mother's in the wild? Witness the maternal instinct of a mommy alligator.

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.sub-title: A Really Big Day at BGT
programme.desc: Witness a day in the life at Busch Gardens Tampa. From house calls on the Serengeti Plain to emergencies in the Animal Care Center... training lions, elephants, hippos, and orangutans. The educators are making enrichment items for the gorillas in the education kitchen while The Wildlife Docs diagnose a grey kangaroo who might have pneumonia. When your job is to take care of 12,000 animals, every day is a big day at Bush Gardens Tampa.

programme.title: Dr. Chris Pet Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Chris is called in to help at the local bat hospital. One of the micro-bats is covered in a mysterious goo, can Dr. Chris help save Millie? And at SASH, a six-year-old aspiring vet helps Dr. Lisa diagnose her listless puppy named Jelly. Then, Dr. Chris is shocked when a wild Currawong is brought into the clinic with a wooden skewer through its wing. Can Dr. Chris save this bird's life?

programme.title: Dr. Chris Pet Vet
programme.desc: Pluto the singing dalmatian has lost his voice, and Dr. Chris fears that the cause may be sinister. And Tim Faulkner needs to remove a scale that has lodged itself over the eye of one of the reptile park's most dangerous snakes - the King Cobra.

programme.title: Nigel Marven Cruise Ship Adventures
programme.desc: On this voyage from Athens around the sun-soaked Greek islands and up the Adriatic coast to Italy, Nigel revels in the natural wonders of this ancient world. In Athens itself he reveals how a little owl was the reason for coins with two faces, the origin of heads and tails. On sun-soaked islands the presenter finds leopard snakes under stones and head-bobbing lizards on castle walls. In Santorini he takes the ship's ballroom stars and singers to dance with fishes, and mountain-climbs in Crete to find soaring griffin vultures. And on a beach near Olympia it's a dream come true for the ship's dancers when they help to rescue tiny loggerhead turtle babies and release them into the sea.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff sails into the bustling port of Hong Kong where he visits the famed Big Buddha and takes a tour of the city's iconic street food. Then, Jeff heads out on the bay to experience Hong Kong's humble fishing village roots. Finally, Jeff savors the time-honored culture of Chinese tea.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff's ship arrives in Tenerife, the largest of Spain's Canary Islands, for an epic adventure exploring Spanish culture and history. Jeff learns an ancient whistling language, and then he crafts artisanal goat cheese. Plus, Jeff encounters critically-endangered angel sharks, park of the region's rare sea life. Finally, Jeff gets face to face with 2,000-year-old mummies as he unwraps the island's mysterious past.

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.desc: Jack and Colton are in Arizona's Petrified Forest National Park checking out one of the world's most highly concentrated areas of petrified wood.

programme.title: Earth: The Nature Of Our Planet
programme.desc: Water is the essential element. It is everywhere – in the air the earth and in the oceans. Water has the power to shape life, yet everyday the ocean surrenders to a much greater force the gravitational pull of our moon. Across the globe, ebb and flow affect every creature, from whale to plankton. But what happens when that tide turns red? Experience the elixir of life – Water.

programme.title: Portugal's Mountains Of Wonder
programme.desc: All in this small area of two mountain ranges, make the Alvão and Marão become “Portugal's Mountains of Wonder”.This film tells the story and portrays several of the region's surprising natural history riches, from forests to geological events, breeding birds of prey, a small butterfly that is an ant deceiver, unique plants to the region and their carnivorous cousins - the Sundew, amazing waterfalls as well as the underwater world of the rivers that create them, and Europe's unique diving song bird - the Dipper.In Trás-os-Montes, the most remote of Portugal's provinces, lying at the northeastern corner of the country, there lie two relatively small mountains that keep nonetheless a vast and rich natural heritage. Local and prominent writer Miguel Torga nicknamed the region “The Wonderfull Kingdom” due to its wonders of wildlife and natural sceneries.

programme.title: Fur Seals: Battle For Survival - Fur Seals: Battle For Survival
programme.desc: Follow two New Zealand Seal pups for the first months of their lives as they learn the secrets of survival.

programme.title: Bridgewater Triangle: Paranormal Vortex
programme.desc: Paranormal encounters in the Bridgewater Triangle UFOs, bigfoot, ghostly apparitions spirits are often sighted

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: CarGo
programme.desc: A young car learns the importance of family when he embarks on a mission to rescue his father - who's been sent to Clunker Island to be repurposed as junk metal.

programme.title: Dragonquest
programme.desc: After the ruthless Krill (Brian Thompson) harnesses the power of a deadly fire-breathing dragon, he begins a bloody campaign of world domination. From the ashes of a scorched village, Arkadi (Daniel Bonjour), an unassuming farm boy, embarks on an arduous journey to restore the lost pieces of a mystical amulet -- the only weapon powerful enough to destroy Krill. With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

programme.title: Hercules Reborn
programme.desc: When a young man's bride is kidnapped by an evil king, he turns to Hercules for help. The fallen hero has been living in exile, banished for killing his family, but the young man's courage inspires Hercules. Together, they fight to rescue the bride and reclaim Hercules' honor.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Giant Octopus
programme.desc: Strange things are afoot in the depths of the sea. First a passenger plane vanishes over the Pacific Ocean. Then an oil platform is obliterated. Marine biologist Emma MacNeil (Deborah Gibson) is dispatched to investigate the phenomena, and, with the help of Japanese scientist Seiji Shimada (Vic Chao), she makes a discovery that will rock the world: An enormous prehistoric shark and a giant octopus have been awakened from their icy slumbers -- and they're hungry.

programme.title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons
programme.desc: Before growing into the legendary adviser to the Pendragons, a youthful Merlin spends his days studying with the Mage (Jürgen Prochnow), a master sorcerer, and honing his magical skills. When a fellow apprentice sorcerer, Hengest (Iago McGuire), grows jealous of Merlin's rapid progress, he rebels against their mutual mentor and betrays King Vortigen (Hefin Wyn) to Saxon invaders. As Hengest conjures an army of dragons, Merlin prepares to test his developing abilities in battle.

programme.title: Black and White: Dawn of Justice

programme.title: Johnny Guitar
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby
programme.desc: Robert Redford stars as Jay Gatsby, who had once loved beautiful, spoiled Daisy Buchanan (Mia Farrow), then lost her to a rich boy. But now Gatsby is mysteriously wealthy...and ready to risk everything to woo Daisy back.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: The Molly Maguires
programme.desc: Life is rough in the coal mines of 1876 Pennsylvania. A group of Irish emigrant miners, known as the Molly Maguires, fights against the cruelty of the mining company with sabotage.

programme.title: When Love Is Not Enough: The Lois Wilson Story

programme.title: The Summer of Ben Tyler

programme.title: Mr. Hockey: The Gordie Howe Story

programme.title: I Do, I Do, I Do
programme.sub-title: I Do, I Do, I Do
programme.desc: An architect (Autumn Reeser) relives her disastrous wedding day over and over until she faces her fears and discovers what she really wants in life.

programme.title: Recipe for Love
programme.desc: A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

programme.title: The Echo of Thunder
programme.desc: A young girl goes to live with her father and stepmother in the Australian outback after her mother's death. Stars Judy Davis and Jamey Sheridan. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: Remake of the 1956 film noir film in which a writer's plan to expose a corrupt DA takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Border Run
programme.desc: An American reporter searches for her missing brother amid the violence that plagues the US/Mexico border.

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: A cop is assigned to the neighborhood where he grew up, where an old secret threatens to destroy his family.

programme.title: In the Blood
programme.desc: A vigilante bride must outfight a foreign underworld to uncover the secrets behind her husband's disappearance.

programme.title: Border Run
programme.desc: An American reporter searches for her missing brother amid the violence that plagues the US/Mexico border.

programme.desc: A confused college student expresses her disbelief in the power of love. Through a class assignment, she examines her own values and finds the love she has been looking for right under her nose.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma and other high school obstacles, developing a friendship through their love of dance.

programme.title: Voyage of the Yes

programme.title: A Boy Called Dad

programme.title: It Takes a Village
programme.desc: Five middle school-aged students face important decisions that will lead them down either a path of destruction or success.

programme.title: Beat Girl
programme.desc: This Emmy-nominated coming-of-age story follows the turbulent life of 19-year-old Heather. Following the death of her mother, Heather is forced to move in with her estranged father and half-brother. Burying herself in music, Heather struggles to find a balance between her friendships and her messy family life, and she is torn between a career as a classical pianist and the enticing world of DJing.

programme.title: The Phantom
programme.desc: The story begins as an expedition lands on the island of Bengalla, seeking the skulls of Touganda. Believed to harness an energy force of power, they could spell disaster for mankind.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: Joe Dante directed this satirical action-comedy about talking tech toys accidentally juiced-up with military microchips.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The greatest adventure of all time begins with Star Trek, the incredible story of a young crew's maiden voyage onboard the most advanced starship ever created: the U.S.S. Enterprise.

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Detective Doyle comes out of retirement to help Hunter investigate the real-life murder of Elizabeth Short.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the mysterious death of a famous movie actress and encounter a surviving sister hungry for the inheritance.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter, investigating the murder of a famous movie actress, follows a contract killer to Mexico and learns why the CIA is interested in the killing.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Captain Devane tries to take Hunter and McCall off the investigation of his ex-wife's murder and violates his forced leave of absence to pursue the killer himself.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall's investigation of the stabbing of a deaf man hinges on cryptic clues the victim gave in sign language before he died.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: The wife of a businessman who was killed in an explosion on his yacht becomes the prime suspect when Hunter and McCall discover that she was recently removed from his will.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the whereabouts of four million dollars still missing from a six-year-old drug bust that implicates the police in criminal activity.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the death of a multi-millionaire, whose four heirs become prime suspects.

programme.title: Blackbear
programme.desc: After two Marines make it home following an ISIS interrogation, one struggles to survive while the other fights his way back into the mixed martial arts world that he left behind years ago.

programme.title: In The Shadow Of The Hill
programme.desc: The residents of Rio de Janeiro's largest slum seek justice for a local man they believe has been murdered by the police.

programme.title: Inside Lehman Brothers
programme.desc: Messy mortgages taken out by Lehman Brothers caused a global financial crisis. Ten years later, the French journalist Jennifer Deschamps examines the moral failures of the institution and the insiders and whistleblowers who attempted to make their voices heard.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: The Search
programme.desc: 'The Search'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Ebony Hustle
programme.desc: BAM baby! You busted! Ex-stripper turned private investigator, Ebony, takes on her most dangerous case yet.

programme.title: Church Folks 2

The clock is ticking, and every passing hour brings them closer to losing their ministry. With their lender itching to foreclose and a wealthy investor eying their building, the stakes have never been this high. Will they be able to bounce back?

programme.title: Dark Seed
programme.desc: The ticking of her biological clock brings Emon, a hard-driving executive in line for a big promotion, to a decision not shared by her amiable husband Idreese in this intimate drama. A guilty secret buried in her past and an unspoken trauma lurking in his bring on a crisis, as the future of their seemingly perfect marriage hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Noxious
programme.desc: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Georgia unfold as the reckless Kennedy discovers her lovers darkest secrets.

programme.title: Make Time 4 Love

programme.title: Her Leather Coat
programme.desc: All family secrets have a price, and a due date, for this family of estranged sisters, the date is now.

programme.title: Adventures in Public School

programme.title: Chalk It Up
programme.desc: When a super girly-girl is dumped by her boyfriend she decides to do everything she can to get him back by building a college gymnastics team.

programme.title: Thrill Ride
programme.desc: Three kids sneak into a theme park where the attractions magically come alive.

programme.title: Fastball

programme.title: Yinz
programme.desc: The aftermath of a prank gone awry tests the bond of three high school best friends as an illicit relationship with an older woman is revealed.

programme.title: Threesomething
programme.desc: Zoe, Charlie, and Isaac spend a night flirting with the idea of a threesome... until it finally happens and all hell breaks loose. While two fall deeply in love, two test their sexual limits. They each discover fantasies they never thought they had and try things they never thought they would. This sexy comedy will make you squirm with its hilarious awkwardness and challenge your ideas of sex, love, and friendship.

programme.desc: About a nouveau-riche Los Angeles couple who, after 17 years of marriage, decide to call it quits.

programme.desc: Two men set out to investigate the hijacking of stagecoaches just before the Civil War.

programme.desc: Government agent Baldwin goes to the Pecos River to track down a gang of stagecoach-rifling outlaws. He "joins" the gang, telling the killers of a payroll shipment, and, when the raiders attack, they are smashed in a rough and tumble gun battle.

programme.title: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: Trappers working as scouts at a remote army fort witness the unprepared garrison attack a sizable Sioux force.

programme.title: Phantom Valley
programme.desc: The Durango Kid attempts to bring peace to the ranchers who are feuding over the robbery and murder of Jim Durant. The action revolves around Starrett's efforts to prevent a nasty range war.

programme.title: The Palomino
programme.desc: A young cattleman helps the owner of a rundown ranch recover a prized stolen breeding stallion.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: A well-meaning drifter is caught between a ranch owner's unfaithful wife and her husband's jealous foreman.

programme.title: Day of the Gun

programme.title: The Shooting
programme.desc: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme

programme.title: Doc
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Western legends Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday and Billy the Kid are played against each other

programme.title: Grey Owl
programme.desc: The story of the life and work of the Canadian fur trapper-turned-conservationist who claimed to be an aboriginal North American.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Several men are vying for a prosperous rancher's daughter's affections. When she is found dead, one of them becomes the prime suspect in her murder.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: As is often the case on Bonanza, things are not always as they first seem. Hoss and Adam eventually learn who is the good guy and who is not.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A disabled New Orleans police inspector (Lloyd Nolan) comes to arrest Ben on a 20-year-old murder charge.

programme.title: A Soldier's Revenge
programme.desc: Haunted by wartime horrors, Civil War soldier-turned-bounty hunter Frank Connor spends his postwar time polishing off two things: whiskey and fugitives.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Lone Ranger and Tonto arrive in Cottonwood in time to see a law reformer gunned down by an outlaw.

programme.title: The Shooting
programme.desc: In the American West, Willet Gashade (Warren Oates), a former bounty hunter, and Coley Boyard (Will Hutchins), his dimwitted partner, are approached by a secretive young woman (Millie Perkins) who offers them money to guide her through the desert but refuses to discuss why she is traveling. The group embarks on the journey and is eventually joined by Billy Spear (Jack Nicholson), a volatile gunslinger the woman has also hired. The only question is why.
